alert.note: Alert for Meade (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 02 at 7:56PM MDT until October 02 at 8:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL MEADE COUNTY... At 755 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Ellsworth Air Force Base, or 16 miles northeast of Rapid City, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 753 PM MDT, half dollar sized hail was reported 7 miles north-northeast of Ellsworth AFB. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Hereford around 800 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
